title: Ryan Burgess
desc: Ryan Burgess is a Manager, UI Engineering at Netflix in California.
about: Ryan Burgess is a Manager, UI Engineering at Netflix in California. Throughout his years of experience he has obtained a great deal of knowledge working for internal and external clients delivering web and mobile applications. He has a extensive experience working with HTML5, CSS3, SASS, LESS, Responsive Design, JavaScript, NodeJS, ReactJS, AngularJS, BackboneJS, JQuery, Mobile, PHP, MySQL, ActionScript 3 and the Adobe Creative Suite.
